title.rendered: New Walls of Books in Spring Hill, Florida!

content.rendered:
The newest Walls of Books opened its doors on February 3rd in Spring Hill, Florida. We are excited about the future of another great store!

A Great Addition to Our Bookstore Chain!

The Book Fair opened in Spring Hill, Florida, in 1983. It has been under the management and ownership of Ruth Wharton since then. Walls of Books purchased the store in December and has converted it into our franchise model. With thousands of new books, updated signage, and a complete procedural overhaul, we think this is a great addition to our bookstore chain!

More Footage of the Opening
